LanguageData.AlphabeaverLeather.label: Кожа альфабобра
LanguageData.AlphabeaverLeather.description: This is the smooth, leathery skin of an Alphabeaver.
LanguageData.AlphamuffaloLeather.label: Шерсть альфамуффало
LanguageData.AlphamuffaloLeather.description: This is wool taken from an Alphamuffalo, be it sheared or skinned.
LanguageData.BorderCollieLeather.label: Мех бордер-колли
LanguageData.BorderCollieLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Border Collie.
LanguageData.CapybaraLeather.label: Кожа капибары
LanguageData.CapybaraLeather.description: This is the smoothed, hairy skin of a Capybara.
LanguageData.ChinchillaLeather.label: Мех шиншиллы
LanguageData.ChinchillaLeather.description: This is the soft, gorgeous fur of a Chinchilla.
LanguageData.CobraLeather.label: Кожа кобры
LanguageData.CobraLeather.description: Cobra Hide is the skin of a Cobra. It is smooth and hairless.
LanguageData.CowLeather.label: Кожа коровы
LanguageData.CowLeather.description: This is the short-haired, leathery skin of a Cow.
LanguageData.DeerLeather.label: Кожа оленя
LanguageData.DeerLeather.description: This is the smoothed, leathery skin of a Deer.
LanguageData.ElephantLeather.label: Кожа слона
LanguageData.ElephantLeather.description: This is the rough, skinned hide of an Elephant.
LanguageData.ElkLeather.label: Кожа лося
LanguageData.ElkLeather.description: This is the smooth, leathery skin of an Elk.
LanguageData.FeatheredRaptorLeather.label: Кожа пернатого раптора
LanguageData.FeatheredRaptorLeather.description: This is the feathered skin of a Feathered Raptor. This rare, exotic leather is quite valuable.
LanguageData.FeenixLeather.label: Кожа феникса
LanguageData.FeenixLeather.description: This is the hot leathery skin of a Feenix. Feenixes are creatures seemingly born from the essence of heat, and are resistant to the effects of heat. Wearing its leather can help you resist heat too.
LanguageData.FenrirLeather.label: Мех Фенрира
LanguageData.FenrirLeather.description: This is the elegant, furry skin of a Fenrir. This rare, exotic fur once belonged to a fearsome beast that cold survive extremely cold weather.
LanguageData.FurxLeather.label: Мех фыркса
LanguageData.FurxLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Furx. While Furx Fur is luxurious and sleek, most hunters deem it a waste of time to hunt for Furxes due to their small body size.
LanguageData.GermanShepherdLeather.label: Мех немецкой овчарки
LanguageData.GermanShepherdLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a German Shepherd.
LanguageData.HareLeather.label: Мех зайца
LanguageData.HareLeather.description: This is a furry skin of a Hare.
LanguageData.HedgehogLeather.label: Кожа ежа
LanguageData.HedgehogLeather.description: This is the smoothed skin of a Hedgehog, with the sharp quills removed.
LanguageData.HumanLeather.label: Кожа человека
LanguageData.HumanLeather.description: This is the skin of a Human, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Human while keeping its skin intact as a textile.
LanguageData.HuskyLeather.label: Мех хаски
LanguageData.HuskyLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Husky.
LanguageData.IcicatLeather.label: Кожа ледяного кота
LanguageData.IcicatLeather.description: This is the frigid leathery skin of an Icicat. Icicats are creatures seemingly born from the essence of cold, and are resistant to the effects of cold temperatures. Wearing its leather can help you resist cold temperatures too.
LanguageData.IguanaLeather.label: Кожа игуаны
LanguageData.IguanaLeather.description: This is the rough, scaly hide of an Iguana.
LanguageData.LabradorRetrieverLeather.label: Мех лабрадора-ретривера
LanguageData.LabradorRetrieverLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Labrador Retriever.
LanguageData.LacosdileLeather.label: Кожа лакосдила
LanguageData.LacosdileLeather.description: This is the rough hide of a Lacosdile.
LanguageData.LionLeather.label: Кожа льва
LanguageData.LionLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Lion or Lioness.
LanguageData.MonkeyLeather.label: Кожа обезьяны
LanguageData.MonkeyLeather.description: Monkey Leather is the skin of a Monkey. It has short hairs that feel smooth to the touch.
LanguageData.NarnLeather.label: Кожа Нарны
LanguageData.NarnLeather.description: This is the skin of a Narn, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Narn while keeping its skin intact as a textile.
LanguageData.NorbalLeather.label: Кожа норбала
LanguageData.NorbalLeather.description: This is the skin of a Norbal, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Norbal while keeping its skin intact as a textile.
LanguageData.NovaLeather.label: Кожа Новы
LanguageData.NovaLeather.description: This is the skin of a Nova, a humanlike race. It is unsettling to think that someone took the time to butcher a dead Nova while keeping its skin intact as a textile.
LanguageData.PigLeather.label: Кожа свиньи
LanguageData.PigLeather.description: This is the short-haired, rough hide of a Pig.
LanguageData.QuadhogLeather.label: Кожа мегасвина
LanguageData.QuadhogLeather.description: This is wool taken from a Quadhog, be it sheared or skinned.
LanguageData.RhinocerosLeather.label: Кожа носорога
LanguageData.RhinocerosLeather.description: this is the tough, rough hide of a Rhinoceros.
LanguageData.RimdogLeather.label: Кожа римдога
LanguageData.RimdogLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Rimdog.
LanguageData.RimwolfLeather.label: Кожа римволка
LanguageData.RimwolfLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Rimwolf.
LanguageData.SamoyedLeather.label: Кожа самоеда
LanguageData.SamoyedLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Samoyed.
LanguageData.SnorkLeather.label: Кожа снорка
LanguageData.SnorkLeather.description: This is the rugged, hairless hide of a Snork.
LanguageData.SquirrelLeather.label: Кожа белки
LanguageData.SquirrelLeather.description: This is the smooth skin of a Squirrel.
LanguageData.ThrumboLeather.label: Шерсть трумбо
LanguageData.ThrumboLeather.description: This is the majestic wool of a Thrumbo that was sheared or skinned from the corpse of one.
LanguageData.TortoiseLeather.label: Кожа черепахи
LanguageData.TortoiseLeather.description: This is the rough, leathery skin of a Tortoise.
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrierLeather.label: Кожа йоркширского терьера
LanguageData.YorkshireTerrierLeather.description: This is the furry skin of a Yorkshire Terrier.
LanguageData.WargLeather.label: Кожа варга
LanguageData.WargLeather.description: This is the smooth, leathery skin of a Warg.
LanguageData.WildBoarLeather.label: Кожа кабана
LanguageData.WildBoarLeather.description: This is the hairy, leathery skin of a Wild Boar.
LanguageData.BoiledLeather.label: Варёная кожа
LanguageData.BoiledLeather.description: Boiled Leather is skins from creatures that have had the hairs and furs removed, and then boiled in liquid to harden the skin. It is useful for hardened grips on weapons or for reinforcing armor.
